snippet: The Italian investment company said its latest offer for the Bermuda reinsurer was superior to a planned merger with Axis Capital Holdings.
abstract: DealBook Online; Italian investment company Exor raises its competing bid for PartnerRe to $6.8 billion in cash; PartnerRe has said earlier in month that it remained committed to merger with Axis Capital Holdings.
lead_paragraph: The Italian investment company said its latest offer for the Bermuda reinsurer was superior to a planned merger with Axis Capital Holdings.

headline.main: Exor Increases Bid for PartnerRe to $6.8 Billion
